channel.title: ubuntu on GHOSTの囁き
channel.description: Recent content in ubuntu on GHOSTの囁き

item.title: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS にdockerをインストールする
item.description: $ sudo apt-get update $ apt-get install -y software-properties-common $ sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common $ curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - $ sudo apt-key fingerprint 0EBFCD88 $ sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] $ https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ $(lsb_release -cs) \ stable" $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install docker-ce $ docker --version
